creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Handwoven band, Printed lining. Red wool ground, pieced in the upper six inches. Polychrome silk and synthetic embroidery. There is a woven cotton edging strip on the four sides. The hanging tabs are silk/cotton ikat. The cotton backing is printed with 'moderne' angular gray shapes on a red ground. Chain stitch separated with back stitch dominate fill.
title: Ilgich
